# Apaleo Integration


Die Client-ID lautet:OSUV-SP-TST

Das Client Secret lautet:AIpyTqLsgsQYOqTywcRIVMSVv2RLgq

(OSUV-SP-TST:AIpyTqLsgsQYOqTywcRIVMSVv2RLgq) -> base64 -> T1NVVi1TUC1UU1Q6QUlweVRxTHNnc1FZT3FUeXdjUklWTVNWdjJSTGdx

```bash
$ curl -X POST -d "grant_type=client_credentials" -H "content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" -H "Authorization: Basic T1NVVi1TUC1UU1Q6QUlweVRxTHNnc1FZT3FUeXdjUklWTVNWdjJSTGdx" https://identity.apaleo.com/connect/token
```

## UI Integration

[Integration API](https://integration.apaleo.com/swagger/index.html)

List integrations (when no integrations present, it returns 204 instead of a more explanative json):

```bash
$ curl -H "Authorization: Bearer JWT" "https://integration.apaleo.com/integration/v1/ui-integrations"
```

Create new integration:

```bash
$ curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer JWT" \
  -d \
  '{
    "label": "Wirelane Test Integration",
    "sourceUrl": "https://wirelane.com/apaleo/reservations/integration?token=[GUID/JWT]",
    "sourceType": "public"
  }' \
  "https://integration.apaleo.com/integration/v1/ui-integrations/DashboardAccountContext"
```

Update existing integration:

```bash
$ curl -X PUT -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjE5NTkyRDA5RTRERkQzNzVGNEIzRTFDNjNGN0QzQjU4NzU5REJFREYiLCJ0eXAiOiJhdCtqd3QiLCJ4NXQiOiJHVmt0Q2VUZjAzWDBzLUhHUDMwN1dIV2R2dDgifQ..b_yTeO2JIBjSQSNOgXS3JoSgXPo-pw5eTcat5fYYN0erUZYR_3wEXt7vnm7GiW9L241tjwJJJm9DrNMmwQAzdZ7rFOjpNrITRtaYf6GNrvT9_3gbCaQ72Ju2LazSW1ItG1MBeL8spLqqq45L8mdFbLorQbnOd34Z-NM0yrtzpWsUZ4lFCGZmjKvtBIxVVxGA9UvvAIc8m4YHc5nctrw8v2_cu3W_1pudOcTI95Rzzan7_kQrk8bxTw3hlHZjtbkT8cYf2ikOrR3C2CETADk6NLciRgtHEWXZ1EBwPZW5qUrY5IrkIHnhG6ytvCPaIsQZ8-3XSUGVx2jnAqyipoO4Bg" \
  -d \
  '{
    "label": "Wirelane Test Integration",
    "sourceUrl": "http://localhost:8888/dashboard",
    "sourceType": "public"
  }' \
  "https://integration.apaleo.com/integration/v1/ui-integrations/DashboardAccountContext/OSUV-AC-WIRELANEINTEGRATIONDEMO-DASHBOARDACCOUNTCONTEXT"
```

Test integration:

```bash
$ curl "https://integration.apaleo.com/integration/v1/ui-integrations/{target}/{id}/$test"
```

### 1.  /authorize bei Apaleo aufrufen

```
https://identity.apaleo.com/connect/authorize?response_type=code&scope=offline_access account.manage accounting.read availability.manage availability.read companies.manage companies.read folios.manage folios.payment-with-charges folios.read invoices.manage invoices.read logs.read maintenances.manage maintenances.read offer-index.read offers.read operations.change-room-state operations.trigger-night-audit rateplans.read-corporate rateplans.read-negotiated rates.manage rates.read reports.read reservations.force-manage reservations.manage reservations.read setup.manage setup.read&client_id=OSUV-AC-WIRELANEINTEGRATIONDEMO&redirect_uri=https://www.wirelane.com
```

C6455D60365AC530CBFE072C1C5F86FDF6D916BC7CA480EFE7B27E08FA6DC4F1

### 3.  Retrieve Access Token

```bash
$ curl \
  -X POST https://identity.apaleo.com/connect/token \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \
  -d 'client_id=OSUV-AC-WIRELANEINTEGRATIONDEMO&client_secret=k9rSrBnZgb4qLoYBk54lfyasn22Ma0&grant_type=authorization_code&code=078642333A4049E6B31FFAC0BDF3573A7083D1DDD72EF0ABDE73B7F1A7F1A76E&redirect_uri=http://localhost:8888'
```
